name: skUnity Galaxy
description: Galaxy theme for the skUnity Forums
additional_info:
10/1/17

  • First update of 2017 brings... literally nothing! Except the removal of the snow...

    • 1/12/16

  • Snow!
  • Christmas Hats!
  • CHRISTMAS!

    • 28/11/16

  • Hotfix 1.0.41: Fixed the obnoxious notification from covering the buttons
  • Removed RSS Feed Icons
  • Added a nice big obnoxious notification that tells you when you're out of date

    24/11/16

  • Stole Pyon's code to make the reply and edit buttons on the right <3

    • Update 4: 23/11/16

  • Fixed a lot of things.

    • Update 3: 23/11/16

  • Fixes the moderation button for posts? Maybe? Who knows.

    • Update 2: 23/11/16

  • Majority of the style has been fixed. Enjoy.

    • Update: 23/11/16

  • Beginning update to new NodeBB Software.
  • This is a BETA Version of skUnity Galaxy. Things will be updated piece by piece.

    • Update: 12/10/16

  • Fixed centering of the Create Topic button, for Blitzy <3

    • Update: 6/10/16

  • Fixed the color of buttons when you hover over them

    • Update: 4/10/16

  • Fixes the Create Topic button

    • Update: 2/10/16

  • Updated for new forum software!
  • The current version number and your current version can now be found at https://forums.skunity.com/galaxyversion

    • Update: 20/9/16

  • Fixed categories color being changed to white only after you hover over them
  • Gatt is special now

    • Update: 8/9/16

  • Moved image host to https://gatt.space again, and fixed the image loading so that the site can still retain its green lock of SSL approval and awesomeness.
  • Version number now shows at the bottom of the skUnity Page

    Update: 1/9/16

  • Pinch, Punch; first day of the month! No returns! Bitch.
  • Admin Page fixes
  • Removed the blackness from the top-bar. I think it broke from the feel. Idk

    • Update: 31/8/16

  • New Topic button now has a border
  • h1, h2, h3 and h4 within the topic editor preview is now fixed, and black again.

    • Update: 27/8/16

  • Fixed Previous Notifications page.

    • Update: 26/8/16

  • Made user profile pictures grow on hover. It looks neat.

    • Update: 25/8/16

  • Fixed #hashtags
  • Fixed admin page
  • Fixed User page (again)
  • It looks fabulous

    • Update: 23/8/16

  • Using personal website to host background - School blocked imgur...
  • Fixed colours for dropdown menus, users top list and profile pages.
